PvP: Hammer Forged/Corkscrew/Fluted/Arrowhead + Accurized + Heating Up/Moving Target/Killing Wind + Rampage/Thresh

This pulse has the highest range in it’s archetype. With 22 base zoom and Killing Wind proc’d, it can reach up to 50m before it encounters damage falloff. Despite this amazing range the maps are not set up for such long range weapons, and combined with Legal Action’s mediocre perks it cannot beat Messenger for best in slot

PvP: Model 8 Red + Accurized +  TD/Overflow + QD / Vorpal / ElementalCap

With a full spec into range, this smg can reach 20m and can work as a worse version of Multimach. Due to the lack of further range increasing perks or good damage perks, that’s where it will stay

PvP:Full Choke + Accurized + Slide/Threat Detector + Snap/OS

Honestly, this archetype is just so bad everywhere and has been for a long time.

Rapid Fire shotguns have a base mag of 7 so Slideshot loads two shells on activation.

PvE: Hard/Quick Launch + Spikes + Field Prep/Clown + Demo/ALH

Spike grenades benefit from reduced blast radius as that shifts more damage to impact damage. Velocity barrels are acceptable, but avoid Confined Launch and Volatile Launch if using spike grenades.

PvP: Confined/Volatile/(Linear/Quick) + Proxi + Qd/Threat Detector + Disruption Break

Inverse of Spikes, we want increased blast radius when using Proximity Grenades - but not at the cost of other stats.
